Dataset.Name: Chinese Breast Cancer Clinical Note Corpus
Dataset.Description: A dataset of 600 clinical notes (100 each from 6 note types) across 100 breast cancer inpatients. Notes include encounter, operation, pathology, radiology, progress, and discharge records annotated with 41 entity types and 34 relation types.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations were made by trained medical students based on a domain-expert-designed information model. BIO tagging format was used. BERT embeddings were fine-tuned using Bi-LSTM-CRF models for NER, and entity relations were extracted with BERT-based classification by replacing entity spans with their semantic types.
